resources.string: User action required to launch JamesDSP
Tap to grant capture permission and enable JamesDSP\'s audio processing
JamesDSP stopped due to audio session control loss. Please disable other audio effect apps.
Audio processing stopped. Another app is interfering with JamesDSP.
Please disable all other apps that provide global audio effects before re-enabling JamesDSP.
This assistant will help you setting up JamesDSP on your device
Press \'Next\' to start the setup process.
Press \'Finish\' to finalize the setup process.

Currently, this application is unfinished and unstable. Please note that it may not work on some devices as expected, since it uses Android APIs not designed for use by third-parties. A detailed list of limitations will be shown later on during the setup process.

ne or more permissions were revoked by you or the system.
In order to ensure that this app behaves correctly, you need to grant these permissions again.

Please re-do the setup wizard to re-grant these permissions.

This app is currently incomplete and under development. It may crash or behave unexpectedly.

Make sure to fully disable other audio effect apps. They are guaranteed to break this application when they attach their own DynamicsProcessing audio effect to a session.

DRM-protected content and apps blocking internal audio capture (e.g., Spotify) stay muted and won\'t output any sound while this app is active. An alternative audio recording method using ADB privileges that is not affected by this restriction may be added at a later time.

After an app opens a new media session to playback audio, you may hear duplicated audio for a very short period (about < 0.5 sec).

Changes made to Android\'s audio system by your OEM/device manufacturer may break this app. This app has been actively tested on these devices:
    • Samsung S20+ (Android 12)
    • Emulator with stock AOSP (Android 10-13)
This app requires special ADB permissions for dumping information about your device\'s audio policy. Please follow the instructions below.

Launch \'Shizuku\' and look for \'Start via Wireless Debugging\'. Tap the \'Pairing\' button and follow the in-app instructions. After pairing Shizuku, start the Shizuku server by pressing the \'Start\' button in their app.
If you run into problems while setting up Shizuku, please refer to their setup tutorial linked in their app.
Tap the button and grant this app access to Shizuku.
Shizuku is not yet installed. Please download and install it from Google Play first.
Please start the Shizuku server before requesting the permission. Go back to instruction step 2.
This application requires Shizuku version 11 or later. Please update Shizuku to the latest version.
Please grant this application access to Shizuku. You may need to open Shizuku\'s permission manager and grant the permission manually, if you denied it and the popup does not show anymore.
Shizuku failed to grant ADB permissions
Please wait a few seconds and try again. If it still does not work, try the alternative method.

Please follow the instructions first and try again. Currently, the special ADB access is not yet set-up properly.\nIf you encounter a problem while getting Shizuku to work, try the alternative method instead.
If you are an experienced user and you know how to use the ADB shell, you can also set-up this app manually.

Step 1: Install ADB on your computer or open webadb.com in your computers' browser.

Step 2: Connect your device via USB to your computer.

Step 3: Open the command prompt and execute the command: 'adb shell' to enter the ADB shell.
If you use webadb, navigate to the 'Interactive shell' section instead.

Step 4: Execute the command 'pm grant me.timschneeberger.rootlessjamesdsp android.permission.DUMP' in the ADB shell.

Step 5: Close this dialog and tap 'Next' to continue.
Additional permissions are required to use this application. Please review them and tap \'Next\' to grant them.
Required to record internal audio. The hardware microphone is not activated.
You need to explicitly grant this app permission to record content every time it launches.
Please grant all requested runtime permissions to continue.\nIf you repeatedly denied the permissions, you need to grant them manually in the system settings.
In case you encounter any issues, please visit the \'Settings > Troubleshooting\' options.
Only listen for session events from the system
Don\'t take any action (may cause duplicated audio)

Enabling this setting can cause duplicated audio when another audio effects app takes control of an audio session.\nPlease keep this setting disabled unless you encounter false-positive session loss events.
Prompt for capture permission after boot
Keep processing even when no content is playing
Pause audio pipeline to save power
View \'Don\'t kill my app\' documentation for your device
Allow notification access for better session detection
Enables more reliable audio session detection
Send crash reports to the developer
Don\'t send crash reports to the developer
Tap and hold any item for more options
The selected file has not have the correct file extension.
Selected VDC file is corrupt. Please choose another one.
Liveprog execution failed. Selected script is damaged.
